text: Ahmed Jibril (1938 - July 7, 2021) was the founder and co-leader of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine-General Command (PFLP-GC). He founded it in 1968. His son Jihad Ahmed Jibril was to take over, but was killed by a car bomb in Beirut in 2002. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Palestinian Muslims Category:Palestinian nationalists Category:Palestinian militants Category:Islamist insurgents
title: Ahmed Jibril
